Package neon.physics

Class Hitbox

java.lang.Object
neon.physics.Hitbox
Direct Known Subclasses:
CircularHitbox, RectangularHitbox
public abstract class Hitbox extends Object
An abstract class for hitboxes.

    • keepWithinBounds

      public void keepWithinBounds​(double lowX, double highX, double lowY, double highY)
      Shifts the hitbox so that it fits within the specified bounds.
      Parameters:
      lowX - the low X bound
      highX - the high X bound
      lowY - the low Y bound
      highY - the high Y bound

    • doesIntersectHitbox

      public abstract boolean doesIntersectHitbox​(Hitbox other) throws UnsupportedOperationException
      Parameters:
      other - the other hitbox
      Returns:
      whether the current hitbox intersects the specified hitbox
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException

    • preventIntersection

      public abstract boolean preventIntersection​(Hitbox other) throws UnsupportedOperationException
      Shifts the hitbox in order to prevent it from intersecting with another hitbox. When shifting, the hitbox takes the path of least resistance.
      Parameters:
      other - the other hitbox
      Returns:
      whether the hitboxes collided
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException

      public abstract Hitbox copy()
      Returns:
      a copy of the object
